description:
A costume for Nobunaga Oda is added.
Enjoy a new and unique costume that gives a fresh look to every battlefield!

■Content
Special  Costume - Nobunaga Oda

■How to use
Costumes can be changed by selecting "Change Costume" at the "Select Character" screen of "Musou Mode" or "Citadel Mode".

Note: This is a bonus product.
Available from June 24th, 2021 to July 26th, 2021.
name: Special  Costume - Nobunaga Oda
